sentences.en: AIM : To investigate the effects of low - dose theophylline on differentiation of the naive T lymphocyte.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究小剂量茶碱对原始T淋巴细胞分化的影响.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Theophylline transdermal patch has good permeation in vitro.
sentences.cn: 结论: 茶碱贴片体外经皮渗透作用较好.

sentences.en: Exceptions include phenytoin, theophylline, and heparin.
sentences.cn: 只有苯妥英 、 茶碱和肝素是例外.

sentences.en: If you take theophylline, your doctor may advise you to avoid caffeine.
sentences.cn: 如果你在服用茶碱类药物，你的医生也可能会建议你远离咖啡因。

sentences.en: Indeed, when caffeine is ingested and broken down by the liver, one byproduct is small amounts of theophylline.
sentences.cn: 事实上，当咖啡因被人们摄入后，它会被肝脏分解，产生的副产物中就含有少量茶碱。

sentences.en: Methods Blood concentration of theophylline was determined by double - wavelength ultraviolet spectrophotometry.
sentences.cn: 方法:采用双波长紫外分光光度法测定茶碱谷浓度.

sentences.en: Objective: To observe the effect of theophylline on the induced sputum cytology of asthma.
sentences.cn: 目的：观察茶碱对哮喘患者诱导痰细胞学的影响。

sentences.en: Other bronchodilating agents include theophylline and anticholinergics.
sentences.cn: 其它舒张气道的激动剂包括茶碱和抗胆碱药.

sentences.en: Taking it along with caffeinated foods and beverages may increase the concentration of theophylline in your blood. This can cause ill effects, such as nausea, vomiting and heart palpitations.
sentences.cn: 与含有咖啡因的食品或饮品共同服用可能会增加血液中的茶碱浓度，这将导致一些不良反应，如恶心、呕吐和心悸等。

sentences.en: Tea contains, in addition to caffeine, small amounts of two other methyl xanthines, theobromine and theophylline, 3, 7 - dimethy1 and 1, 3 - dimethy1 xanthine , respectively.
sentences.cn: 茶除了含咖啡因以外，还含有少量的另外两种甲基黄酮嘌呤，即可可堿和茶堿，它们分别是3 ， 7 -二甲基黄嘌呤和1 ， 3 -二甲基黄嘌呤。

sentences.en: The experts, Yunwu Cha - rich theophylline, tea tannins, vitamins.
sentences.cn: 经专家鉴定, 云雾茶富含茶碱 、 茶丹宁 、 维生素.

sentences.en: The insoluble capsule body, fast - release theophylline tablet and erodible plug were prepared , respectively.
sentences.cn: 分别制备了不溶性囊身 、 茶碱速释片和溶蚀性盖塞片.

sentences.en: The primary bulk pharmaceuticals produced are: Caffeine, Theophylline, Aminophylline, Metronidazole , Metronidazole benzoate, Secnidazaole and Nifedipine.
sentences.cn: 公司生产的主要原料药有: 咖啡因 、 茶碱 、 氨茶碱 、 甲硝唑 、 苯酰甲硝唑、噻硝唑、硝苯地平.

sentences.en: To investigate the mechanism of anti - inflammatory action of theophylline on asthma.
sentences.cn: 目的:研究小剂量茶碱 抗 哮喘炎症的可能机制.

sentences.en: Xanthan gum hydrophilic matrix tablets were prepared using theophylline as a model drug.
sentences.cn: 以茶碱为模型药物,制备了黄原胶亲水性骨架片,研究了体外释药的影响因素.

trans.tran_en: a white crystalline slightly water-soluble alkaloid that is an isomer of theobromine: it occurs in plants, such as tea, and is used to treat asthma
